dcterms:description: The LTST database contains 20-24 hour ambulatory 2-3 lead ECG recordings. These recordings are sampled at 250Hz. The annotation provided in the LTST database is semi-automatically generated by human experts and computer algorithms. There are three different levels of ST change annotation available in the LTST database, and protocol-B is used where V-Min is set to 100uv and T-min is set to 30 seconds.
dcterms:title: LTST Database

dcterms:description: The RCE-India Data collection protocol involved collecting de-identified ECG samples from 14 ischemic and 14 non-ischemic patients aged 55-85 at a community hospital and cardiac research institute in Nagpur, India. The study aimed to perform automated ischemia detection using ECG waveforms analyzed by deep learning.
dcterms:title: RCE-India Data collection protocol
